AI_QUALITY_FAILURES.reasoning: The ATLAS interaction shown is limited to requesting more detail/log uploads and does not contain clear incorrect guidance, broken templates, or customer complaints about AI quality.
evidence: ATLAS: "Please select from the below or give me a detailed description of what’s happening. Any error messages you’ve seen or steps you’ve already tried would be really helpful."
ATLAS: "If you have any 📃 log files or 🖼️ screenshots to upload to help with the troubleshooting, now is the time to do it"

AI_WALL_LOOPING.reasoning: There is no indication the customer was stuck in an AI loop or unable to reach a human; subsequent handling and troubleshooting is done by human agents in public replies.
evidence: Randall Shawver (public): "To properly resolve this recurring issue, I need you to run the following commands and provide the output:"
Syed Haider (public): "Please join me for your scheduled meeting using this link"

IGNORING_CONTEXT.reasoning: Support acknowledges the issue is recurring and references the prior ticket. While the customer requested a shell key after one was previously included, support resent a new key rather than repeatedly asking for already-provided information.
evidence: Randall Shawver (public): "Thank you for the follow-up. I can see from your previous diagnostics that this is a recurring issue"
Randall Shawver (public): "I am resending this last response, which did include the shell unlock key. I am sending a new key."

RESPONSE_DELAYS.reasoning: There are multiple customer-facing signals of delayed response, including customer follow-ups asking for updates and an explicit support apology for delayed response. There are also multi-day gaps between customer requests and staff replies.
evidence: Monyah Aladeli (public, 2025-10-26): "Please any update here? Can you provide the below request ASAP."
Syed Haider (public, 2025-11-04): "I sincerely apologize for the delayed response on this ticket."
Customer (public, 2025-10-23): "Please provide us with the shell license key to execute these commands."
Randall Shawver (public, 2025-10-27): "I am resending this last response, which did include the shell unlock key. I am sending a new key."

PREMATURE_CLOSURE.reasoning: Although the ticket includes an auto-closure warning ('stay open for one week unless...'), the text does not show the ticket actually being closed while the customer still had unresolved requests.
evidence: Randall Shawver (public): "This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with \"This ticket can be closed\" or update the status to Completed in the portal."
Randall Shawver (public): "We will write to you again to remind you."

P1_SEV1_MISHANDLING.reasoning: The customer expresses urgency, but there is no explicit P1/SEV1/outage/production-down statement. Support engaged with troubleshooting and scheduled a live session; the record does not clearly show a high-severity process being mishandled.
evidence: Monyah Aladeli (public): "We are at critical stage and must expediate all the tasks and activities"
Syed Haider (public): "During our session, we observed that the appliance was running slowly... we performed the following actions"
